definitions.definition: A garden tool with a handle and a flat blade for digging . Not to be confused with a shovel which is used for moving earth or other materials.
A cutting instrument used in flensing a whale .
( electrical engineering ) A device for terminating an electrical conductor resembling a small spade.

main_definition: A garden tool with a handle and a flat blade for digging . Not to be confused with a shovel which is used for moving earth or other materials.
secondary_definitions: A cutting instrument used in flensing a whale .
( electrical engineering ) A device for terminating an electrical conductor resembling a small spade.

definitions.definition: A playing card marked with the symbol ♠ .
examples: I've got only one spade in my hand.

main_definition: ( card games ) A playing card marked with the symbol ♠ .
secondary_definitions: ( offensive , ethnic slur ) A black person.
